snippet.title: Eternal Vigil DEMO - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The DEMO will be released on the 19th of January, 2024 at 20:00 UTC, mark your calendars!

🎮 In "Eternal Vigil," you'll defend a sacred crystal against monstrous invaders. Use a variety of weapons, deploy powerful turrets, and unleash unique abilities in your quest to become the ultimate defender. Every decision counts in this intense, strategy-driven adventure.

🔥 Key Features:
    Diverse combat with an array of weapons and magical abilities.
    Strategic turret deployment to defend against challenging enemies.
    Dynamic gameplay with unpredictable crystal elements.

🔗 Follow Us:
    Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2543750
    Official Discord: https://discord.gg/sSZEV8Rbw8
    Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/EmberEyeStudio
    Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100094322662442
    Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/embereyeofficial
    TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@embereyestudio
